mapper.sql: sid, pno, mid, jid, rid, shealth, sheight, splace, snation, smarry, seducation, sschool, smajor, smajorlevel, sfiel, speople, speoplephone, sindate, sinterniship, sbirthday, sstarttime, sendtime, srecommed, snonumber, sinnumber, salldiscount, sworkdiscount, sshopdiscount, sdiscount, job_resume, education_experience, family_member, Disciplinary_records, Employment_advice, remark1, remark2, remark3
mapper.select: SELECT st.*,peo.*,mech.mname mname,mech.parentid,j.jname jname,r.rname rname FROM staff AS st LEFT JOIN people AS peo ON st.pno = peo.pno LEFT JOIN mechanism AS mech ON st.mid = mech.mid LEFT JOIN job AS j ON j.jid = st.jid LEFT JOIN role AS r ON r.rid = st.rid WHERE (st.pno LIKE concat("%",#{pno},"%") OR peo.pname LIKE concat("%",#{pno},"%") OR peo.pphone LIKE concat("%",#{pno},"%")) AND st.mid=#{mid} ORDER BY st.pno

SELECT st.*,peo.*,mech.mname mname,mech.parentid,j.jname jname,r.rname rname FROM staff AS st LEFT JOIN people AS peo ON st.pno = peo.pno LEFT JOIN mechanism AS mech ON st.mid = mech.mid LEFT JOIN job AS j ON j.jid = st.jid LEFT JOIN role AS r ON r.rid = st.rid WHERE (st.pno LIKE concat("%",#{pno},"%") OR peo.pname LIKE concat("%",#{pno},"%") OR peo.pphone LIKE concat("%",#{pno},"%")) AND mech.parentid=#{parentid} ORDER BY st.pno

select
distinct
from staff
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into staff (sid, pno, mid, jid, rid, shealth, sheight, splace, snation, smarry, seducation, sschool, smajor, smajorlevel, sfiel, speople, speoplephone, sindate, sinterniship, sbirthday, sstarttime, sendtime, srecommed, snonumber, sinnumber, salldiscount, sworkdiscount, sshopdiscount, sdiscount, job_resume, education_experience, family_member, Disciplinary_records, Employment_advice, remark1, remark2, remark3) values (#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shealth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sheight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{splace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{snation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smarry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seducation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sschool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smajorlevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfiel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{speople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{speoplephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sindate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sinterniship,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sbirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sstarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{srecommed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{snonumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sinnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salldiscount,jdbcType=REAL}, #{sworkdiscount,jdbcType=REAL}, #{sshopdiscount,jdbcType=REAL}, #{sdiscount,jdbcType=REAL}, #{jobResume,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{educationExperience,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{familyMember,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disciplinaryRecords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employmentAdvice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update staff
sid = #{record.sid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pno = #{record.pno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mid = #{record.mid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jid = #{record.jid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rid = #{record.rid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
shealth = #{record.shealth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sheight = #{record.sheight,jdbcType=REAL},
splace = #{record.splace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
snation = #{record.snation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
smarry = #{record.smarry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seducation = #{record.seducation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sschool = #{record.sschool,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
smajor = #{record.smajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
smajorlevel = #{record.smajorlevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sfiel = #{record.sfiel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
speople = #{record.speople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
speoplephone = #{record.speoplephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sindate = #{record.sindate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sinterniship = #{record.sinterniship,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sbirthday = #{record.sbirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sstarttime = #{record.sstarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sendtime = #{record.sendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
srecommed = #{record.srecommed,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
snonumber = #{record.snonumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sinnumber = #{record.sinnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salldiscount = #{record.salldiscount,jdbcType=REAL},
sworkdiscount = #{record.sworkdiscount,jdbcType=REAL},
sshopdiscount = #{record.sshopdiscount,jdbcType=REAL},
sdiscount = #{record.sdiscount,jdbcType=REAL},
job_resume = #{record.jobResume,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
education_experience = #{record.educationExperience,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
family_member = #{record.familyMember,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Disciplinary_records = #{record.disciplinaryRecords,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Employment_advice = #{record.employmentAdvice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark1 = #{record.remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark2 = #{record.remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark3 = #{record.remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
